...there was a wolf that put on a sheep's skin...
...to make the sheep on a farm think he was one of them.
Then they would let him get near them,...
...and he would be able to kill and eat one of them.
When night came, the farmer shut up all his sheep...
...including the wolf in sheep's clothing, to keep them safe during the night.
...he went to pick a sheep to kill so his family would have meat to eat.
He looked for what he thought was the largest sheep and killed it.
